title: NVIDIA driver too old error
body_html:
I am getting the following error:

File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Projects/nlm_cnn/train.py", line 116, in main
train_loss, train_acc = train(train_loader, model, criterion, optimizer, epoch, cuda, log_writer)
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Projects/nlm_cnn/train.py", line 147, in train
for i, (image, target) in enumerate(pbar):
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tqdm/_tqdm.py", line 953, in iter
for obj in iterable:
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 210, in next
return self._process_next_batch(batch)
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 230, in _process_next_batch
raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg)
AssertionError: Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 64, in pin_memory_loop
batch = pin_memory_batch(batch)
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 132, in pin_memory_batch
return [pin_memory_batch(sample) for sample in batch]
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 132, in
return [pin_memory_batch(sample) for sample in batch]
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 126, in pin_memory_batch
return batch.pin_memory()
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/tensor.py", line 82, in pin_memory
return type(self)().set(storage.pin_memory()).view_as(self)
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/storage.py", line 83, in pin_memory
allocator = torch.cuda._host_allocator()
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/cuda/init.py", line 312, in _host_allocator
_lazy_init()
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/cuda/init.py", line 120, in _lazy_init
_check_driver()
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/cuda/init.py", line 71, in _check_driver
of the CUDA driver.""".format(str(torch._C._cuda_getDriverVersion())))
AssertionError:
The NVIDIA driver on your system is too old (found version 9000).
Please update your GPU driver by downloading and installing a new
version from the URL: http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx
Alternatively, go to: http://pytorch.org to install
a PyTorch version that has been compiled with your version
of the CUDA driver.

My system configuration:
Ubuntu 16.04
Geforce GTX 1080 TI.
Latest Nvidia driver (384.111)
CUDA 9.1
CUDNN 7.0
Pytorch 0.3.0 built from source.
Python 3.6.4 :: Anaconda custom (64-bit)

Please help! :(
body_text:
I am getting the following error:
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Projects/nlm_cnn/train.py", line 116, in main
train_loss, train_acc = train(train_loader, model, criterion, optimizer, epoch, cuda, log_writer)
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Projects/nlm_cnn/train.py", line 147, in train
for i, (image, target) in enumerate(pbar):

for obj in iterable:
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 210, in next
return self._process_next_batch(batch)
File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 230, in _process_next_batch
raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg)

of the CUDA driver.""".format(str(torch._C._cuda_getDriverVersion())))

body:
I am getting the following error:

  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Projects/nlm_cnn/train.py", line 116, in main
    train_loss, train_acc = train(train_loader, model, criterion, optimizer, epoch, cuda, log_writer)
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Projects/nlm_cnn/train.py", line 147, in train
    for i, (image, target) in enumerate(pbar):
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tqdm/_tqdm.py", line 953, in __iter__
    for obj in iterable:
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 210, in __next__
    return self._process_next_batch(batch)
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 230, in _process_next_batch
    raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg)
AssertionError: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 64, in _pin_memory_loop
    batch = pin_memory_batch(batch)
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 132, in pin_memory_batch
    return [pin_memory_batch(sample) for sample in batch]
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 132, in <listcomp>
    return [pin_memory_batch(sample) for sample in batch]
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 126, in pin_memory_batch
    return batch.pin_memory()
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/tensor.py", line 82, in pin_memory
    return type(self)().set_(storage.pin_memory()).view_as(self)
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/storage.py", line 83, in pin_memory
    allocator = torch.cuda._host_allocator()
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/cuda/__init__.py", line 312, in _host_allocator
    _lazy_init()
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/cuda/__init__.py", line 120, in _lazy_init
    _check_driver()
  File "/home/yuval/Dev/Python/Shared/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/cuda/__init__.py", line 71, in _check_driver
    of the CUDA driver.""".format(str(torch._C._cuda_getDriverVersion())))
AssertionError: 
The NVIDIA driver on your system is too old (found version 9000).
Please update your GPU driver by downloading and installing a new
version from the URL: http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx
Alternatively, go to: http://pytorch.org to install
a PyTorch version that has been compiled with your version
of the CUDA driver.

My system configuration:
Ubuntu 16.04
Geforce GTX 1080 TI.
**Latest Nvidia driver (384.111)**
CUDA 9.1
CUDNN 7.0
Pytorch 0.3.0 built from source.
Python 3.6.4 :: Anaconda custom (64-bit)

Please help! :(
